articles.title: Mysterious rocket from unknown origin crashes into moon: NASA - Geo News
articles.description: NASA shares in press release that collision caused two overlapping impacts sites; one crater measures 59 feet and another 52.5 feet
articles.content:
• Mysterious rocket crashes into far side of moon.
  • One crater measures 59 feet and another 52.5 feet.
  • So far, no country or agency has taken any responsibility for collision.
